entry.lex: Eric Flint was born in Burbank, California and came under the influence of Robert A Heinlein. He is the author of 1634: The Bavarian Crisis which is preceded by 1634: The Baltic War. Also preceding the book are the DeMarce short stories in the Grantville Gazettes.
